EU.07: A credit insurance company (FRANCE)

Profile

It is a professional credit insurer operating globally, offering companies solutions to protect them against the risk of financial default of their clients, both in their domestic and export market. In complement to credit insurance, it also offers debt collection services, factoring and business information, as well as bonds.

 

Created in 1946, it was listed on the Euronext Paris stock exchange in 2014. 4,600 staff in 66 countries provide a local service worldwide. Each quarter, it publishes its assessments of country risk for 160 countries, based on its knowledge of companies’ payment behaviour and on the expertise of its underwriters.

简介

它是一家在全球范围内运作的专业信用保险公司，为公司提供解决方案，以防止其客户在其国内和出口市场出现财务违约风险。同时，它还提供收债服务、保理和商业信息以及债券。

该公司创建于1946年，于2014年在巴黎证券交易所上市。它在66个国家拥有4600名员工，在全球范围内提供本地服务。基于对公司支付行为和承销商专业知识的了解，每季度都会发布160个国家的国家风险评估报告。

Business Interest

We would like to use this convention to meet our counterparts, explore potential partners and business opportunities in the chemical industry.

合作需求

我们希望利用此次大会结实同行，寻求潜在的合作伙伴和商业机会。

ABOUT US

Launched by the Global Alliance of SMEs (GASME), World Manufacturing Convention 2018 is co-hosted by Global Alliance of SMEs, United Nations Industrial Development Organization, Anhui Provincial Government, Chinese People’s Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries. This convention will kick off in Hefei in May 2018.
